tha-ap534:8.4: jinuttamo → anuttamo (bj, mr) | januttamo (s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap534:14.2: sattamake muni → ito sattamakehani (bj, pts1) | idha saddhādhimutto isi (s2, s3)
tha-ap534:34.2: assāsayi → mamāha so (bj) | assāsayaṃ (s2, s3) | mamāhasa (pts1)
tha-ap534:36.1: Punopi → punāpi (si, s2, s3) | muni maṃ (mr)
